column2: "I have put you through much trouble. Your fundamentals are solid. I have high hopes for you."
"But saying that, there's every chance it could all be thrown away. Whether you live up to your potential is up to you."
"By the way, are you making use of Just Guards?"
"If you intend to fight as a Hunter, you'd do well to learn about it. Until we meet again!"
"Just Guard is one of the many skills you can acquire."
"Normally, when Guarding, you still take minor damage."

"A Just Guard occurs when you time a Guard right before taking an enemy attack, and reduces damage to 0.
Just Guarding does not cost PP.

In addition, some Guarded damage will be reflected back to the enemy, making it an excellent skill for close-range combat."
